name: Allayo
overview:
“Do it yourself technology with a Personal Touch”

We have an extremely easy to use application that provides our members a simple way to request health care services such as doctors appointments, prescription refills and lab work; plus reminders and a central location for viewing their health care information.

Our members also earn rewards as they use the service, and we are adding more loyalty and gamification to increase the engagement with members around their treatment plans.

The real bonus is that we combine all this with “certified medical assistants” who are trained in medical processes, systems and coding and are available live on the phone or through secure chat to take care of our members health care needs.

You can create reminders for appointments, order labs and refills, receive discounts on meds, labs and supplements , record every health care expenses and savings ability to earn rewards. Best of all you are assigned our own personal health care assistant for an easy way to request new services.

Just like Kodak founder George Eastman said in the beginning of the personal camera, “You Press the Button, We Do the Rest..”

One click prescription refills, appointments, labs, supplements, and immediate access to your health care information, all data security based on HIPAA standards, everything you need to successfully manage your health care.
